lead_paragraph: Corey Kluber admitted there was an extra buzz in the Indians' clubhouse before Sunday's game against Oakland. Acquiring one of the best relievers can do that to a team.

headline.print_headline: Kluber, Napoli Lead Indians Past A's 8-0 for Sweep
headline.main: Kluber, Napoli Lead Indians Past A's 8-0 for Sweep
